name: Evanora, the medicine woman
text: Welcome, traveler, to the heart of warmth and healing! I'm Evanora, the village's medicine woman. Should you need mending, be it body or spirit, my door is always open. May your journey be as gentle as the whispering wind through the trees.

name: Evanora, the medicine woman
text: Greetings, wanderer! You've found yourself in a place of peace and herbal wonders. I am Evanora, keeper of remedies and soothing words. If ever your soul seeks comfort or your wounds need tending, do not hesitate to visit me. May your path be lined with the gentle melodies of nature.

name: Evanora, the medicine woman
text: Ah, a fresh face graces our fair village! Welcome, dear soul. I am Evanora, the weaver of herbal cures and bearer of tranquil thoughts. Should you require a remedy or a kind word, you'll always find them here. May your days be as bright and blooming as the wildflowers of Telmaron.
